stories.text: My home power (electricity) company recently apparently started using a service called "Bidgely" that tracks my usage: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F9D__pRGM6A - this seems like an invasion of privacy to me - is there anything I can do to get out of this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Electricity Company Privacy Concerns

stories.text:
Hello HN!

I'm a swimmer and I watch a lot of swimming videos on YouTube. I wanted to curate and collect all the swimming videos. So that's exactly what I did.

https://flyn.app

Videos are categorized by events, strokes, gender etc. I find and curate ~20-30 vidoes a day. Hope some of you also enjoy it!
stories.title: Show HN: Curated collection of elite swimming videos
